title: Paris 36
overview: A star is born in a time of both celebration and instability in this historical drama with music from director Christophe Barratier. In the spring of 1936, Paris is in a state of uncertainty; while the rise of the Third Reich in Germany worries many, a leftist union-oriented candidate, LÃ©on Blum, has been voted into power, and organized labor is feeling its new power by standing up to management.
